languages.text: {n}Массивная дверь испещрена мелкими сколами, царапинами и следами от пуль. Не видно ни поворотного механизма, ни рычагов, ни какого-либо замка. Справа в стену встроена запылившаяся панель. При вашем приближении треснувший экран начинает слабо мигать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Массивная дверь испещрена мелкими сколами, царапинами и следами от пуль. Не видно ни поворотного механизма, ни рычагов, ни какого-либо замка. Справа в стену встроена запылившаяся панель. При вашем приближении треснувший экран начинает слабо мигать.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Массивная дверь испещрена мелкими сколами, царапинами и следами от пуль. Не видно ни поворотного механизма, ни рычагов, ни какого-либо замка. Справа в стену встроена запылившаяся панель. При вашем приближении треснувший экран начинает слабо мигать.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. No sign of turning mechanism, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

{n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. No sign of turning mechanism, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

{n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

{n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

{n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨大的门上布满了碎片、划痕与弹痕，上面没有任何铰链、杠杆，或是类似门锁的东西。右边的墙上有个布满灰尘的控制面板。当你接近它时，它破裂的屏幕开始微弱地闪烁起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大的门上布满了碎片、划痕与弹痕，上面没有任何铰链、杠杆，或是类似门锁的东西。右边的墙上有个布满灰尘的控制面板。当你接近它时，它破裂的屏幕开始微弱地闪烁起来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Esta inmensa puerta está cubierta de muescas, arañazos y agujeros de bala. No ves bisagras, palancas ni nada que parezca una cerradura. En la pared de la derecha hay un panel polvoriento. Cuando te acercas, su pantalla agrietada se ilumina de forma intermitente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Esta inmensa puerta está cubierta de muescas, arañazos y agujeros de bala. No ves bisagras, palancas ni nada que parezca una cerradura. En la pared de la derecha hay un panel polvoriento. Cuando te acercas, su pantalla agrietada se ilumina de forma intermitente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}巨大なドアにはあちこちが欠け、傷、銃弾の跡が点在している。ヒンジ、レバー、また、鍵に似たようなものはまったく見当たらない。右側の壁に埃っぽいパネルが埋め込まれていて、近づくと、ひび割れた画面がかすかに点滅し始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}巨大なドアにはあちこちが欠け、傷、銃弾の跡が点在している。ヒンジ、レバー、また、鍵に似たようなものはまったく見当たらない。右側の壁に埃っぽいパネルが埋め込まれていて、近づくと、ひび割れた画面がかすかに点滅し始める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die massive Tür ist voller kleiner Abplatzungen, Kratzer und Projektilspuren. Scharniere, Hebel oder so etwas wie ein Schloss sind nicht zu sehen. In der Wand rechts daneben befindet sich ein verstaubtes Bedienfeld. Als du dich näherst, flackert der rissige Bildschirm ein wenig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die massive Tür ist voller kleiner Abplatzungen, Kratzer und Projektilspuren. Scharniere, Hebel oder so etwas wie ein Schloss sind nicht zu sehen. In der Wand rechts daneben befindet sich ein verstaubtes Bedienfeld. Als du dich näherst, flackert der rissige Bildschirm ein wenig.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La porte massive est couverte de petits éclats, de rayures et d'impacts de balles. Vous ne distinguez aucune charnière, aucun levier ou mécanisme d'ouverture. Un panneau poussiéreux est encastré dans le mur de droite. Lorsque vous vous en approchez, l'écran fissuré clignote faiblement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La porte massive est couverte de petits éclats, de rayures et d'impacts de balles. Vous ne distinguez aucune charnière, aucun levier ou mécanisme d'ouverture. Un panneau poussiéreux est encastré dans le mur de droite. Lorsque vous vous en approchez, l'écran fissuré clignote faiblement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devasa kapının üzeri ufak çentik, çizik ve kurşun işaretleriyle kaplı. Ne menteşe, ne bir kapı kolu ne de kilidi andıran bir şey görünmüyor. Sağ tarafta duvara gömülü bir panel toz tutmuş. Çatlak ekran, yaklaşmanla birlikte hafifçe titreşmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The massive door is dotted with small chips, scratches, and bullet marks. There is no sign of any hinges, levers, or anything resembling a lock. There is a dusty panel built into the wall to the right. As you approach, the cracked screen starts to flicker faintly.{/n}
